name: Revelation (itch)
description:
A short game about acceptance and renewal. Made for the Guildford Games Festival Game Jam 2020!

Programming: Reece Banbury

Story by: Kevin Davey, Lorraine Ansell

Sound Design: Kevin Davey

Music: Alyx Jones

3D Art: Anna Latchman

 

Voices:

Lorraine Ansell

Natalie Chilsolm

Andrew James Spooner

Dave Jones

Mike Bodie
